__TOC__

All essential features of Samsung Series 9 laptops work out of the box on Ubuntu 14.04.

Regretfully with 14.10 and Kernel 3.16 an ACPI regression was introduced, see <nowiki>[[https://bugzilla.kernel.org/show_bug.cgi?id=44161#c184|kernel 44161]]</nowiki>.
You can use this <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/971061/comments/102|workaround]]</nowiki> to restore <nowiki>[[#SuspendOnLidClose|Suspend on lid close]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[#BatteryStatus|Battery status]]</nowiki>.

=== Support Status ===

==== Full (works out of the box) ====
** Video
** !WiFi
** Gigabit Ethernet
** Audio (including microphone, except on 900X3G ?)
** HDMI out
** USB
** Webcam
** SD card
** Bluetooth
** Suspend/Hibernate
** <nowiki>[[#FnKeys|Function keys]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[#Keyboard backlight|Keyboard backlight]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[#Touchpad|Touchpad]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[#SuspendOnLidClose|Suspend on lid close]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[#BatteryStatus|Battery status]]</nowiki>
** Ambient light sensor

==== Untested ====
** Wireless Display (!WiDi) technology
** Intel Rapid Start Technology

==== Outstanding Issues ====
** LED does not light up when muting the sound by pressing Fn+F6.
** Laptop does not resume on Lid open. Need to press the power button to resume from suspend.
** Screen brightness resets to 100% on reboot.
** On model 900X3G (and possibly others) the internal microphone is not working properly. See bug <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/alsa-driver/+bug/1316518|launchpad 1316518]]</nowiki>. Plugged-in headset microphone works though.

----

=== Function keys ===
In Ubuntu 14.04 work out of the box: screen backlight, sound control, keyboard backlight. Doesn't work: Wifi, silent mode.

Instruction for former issues on pre 14.04 can be found <nowiki>[[http://jablonskis.org/2012/linux-and-samsung-series-laptop-9-fn-keys/|here]]</nowiki>.

=== Suspend on lid close ===

Automatic suspend on lid close works since 14.04, it might take up to 10 seconds though (see
<nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/986724|launchpad 986724]]</nowiki>,
<nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/971061|launchpad 971061]]</nowiki> and
<nowiki>[[https://bugzilla.kernel.org/show_bug.cgi?id=44161|kernel 44161]]</nowiki>).

=== Battery Status ===

Battery status works since 14.04. (<nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/acpi/+bug/971061|lauchpad 971061]]</nowiki>)

=== Keyboard backlight ===
Keyboard backlight seems to only work when Ubuntu is not running in UEFI mode. <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gnome-settings-daemon/+bug/1203592|This bug]]</nowiki> was submitted to track the problem.

=== Touchpad ===
Pointer movement, left- and right- clicking and two-finger scrolling are fully supported. Touchpad options are available in System Settings > Mouse and Touchpad.
